title: FPS Drop
body: Ok, I Usually get about 70 to 100 fps but after the 5.20 Patch I've been getting around 40 to 50 is there a way i can fix this? If you can help me thanks

replies.body: Hey there! I could give you a hand. Riot has an amazing fps KB you can follow so it can help fix your issue: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-troubleshooting
